item.title: Installing VMware ESXi on an Intel J1900
item.description: Attempting to install ESXi on an Intel J1900 results in an error. The boot process freezes on: Relocating modules and starting up the kernel… The fix can be found at: an archive of the original blog post In short, At the ESXi boot screen, press Shift+O to open the boot options prompt. In the boot options line that appears, add the following after a space at the end of the line: ignoreHeadless=TRUE.
